You can download the 32bit trial version from Paragon website, then use the registration info from this torrent, it will work.

v8 is not compatible with Windows 7 SP1 (I blame Micro$oft). Paragon has release v9, but the v8 serial doesn't work for v9.
Any chance of an updated release? Thanks
Much better than macdrive. However, it shows the hidden files on HFS partitions. Also, version 9 has been released which addresses this issue. Anyone got a serial?
